description:
After making it to the next level, Hakuno and Saber are immediately ambushed. Just as things seem hopeless, they meet a stranger named Rani VIII.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Kao no Nai Ou: No Face Mei King
The Faceless King: No Face May King
顔の無い王 ノーフェイス・メイキング
얼굴 없는 왕: No Face Mei King
